name: Circle of Stars
description: Druids of the Circle of Stars draw power from constellations, assuming starry forms that guide, heal, and destroy.

2.name: Star Map
2.description: You create a magical star map that enhances your spellcasting.

2.name: Starry Form
2.description: You expend Wild Shape to assume a starry constellation form.

6.name: Cosmic Omen
6.description: You can alter attack rolls or saving throws based on a cosmic portent.

10.name: Twinkling Constellations
10.description: Your starry forms improve and grant additional benefits.

14.name: Full of Stars
14.description: You gain resistance to physical damage while in Starry Form.
